title: Does the proposed Transportation Bond Issue by the City of Wilmington include any provision for additional street lighting needs in the city and where can I find the complete list of projects that the bond will cover so I can make an informed decision on how to vote in November?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://agenda.blogs.starnewsonline.com/23677/wilmington-projects-funded-by-proposed-transportation-bond/
